changeSet.createView: SELECT p.id,p.apply_number,p.stock_out_plan_code,p.stock_out_plan_date as plan_date,a.purpose_of_sample, (select count(t.id) from stock_out_req_frozen_tube t left join stock_out_requirement r on t.stock_out_requirement_id = r.id where r.stock_out_apply_id = a.id and t.status!='1302') as count_of_stock_out_plan_sample, (select count(s.id) from stock_out_task s where s.stock_out_plan_id = p.id and s.status = '1603') ||'/'|| (select count(s.id) from stock_out_task s where s.stock_out_plan_id = p.id )as count_of_stock_out_task,p.status FROM stock_out_plan p LEFT JOIN stock_out_apply a ON p.stock_out_apply_id = a.id
